endpoints.description: Retrieve current and historical market trends in the real estate sector.
Fetch an accurate market value estimation for a specified property.
Access demographic information for a selected geographic area.
Generate a tailored report based on provided criteria and analysis preferences.
List top-performing real estate investment opportunities.
Review data and performance metrics for Equity Real Estate Investment Trusts (REITs).
Obtain comprehensive details about a specific neighborhood's characteristics.
Save user preferences for personalized data recommendations.
Retrieve records of recent property sales in a particular area.
Subscribe to updates about specific properties or market changes.
